entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
